hibernate-mapping.query: select new tlfdto (vw.ENo,vw.Narration,vw.Amount,vw.Date_Time,vw.SourceCurrency,vw.SourceBranch,vw.AcctNo) from TLMVIW00001 as vw where vw.SourceBranch=:sourceBr
select new depodenodto (vw.TLF_ENO,vw.Entry_NO,vw.AccountType,vw.Amount,vw.Currency,vw.SourceBranch) from TLMVIW00002 as vw where vw.SourceBranch=:sourceBr
select new podto(vw.PoNo,vw.Acode,vw.ADate,vw.Amount) from TLMVIW00003 as vw where vw.SourceBranchCode=:SourceBranchCode

select new ibldto( ibl.FROMBRANCH, ibl.TOBRANCH, ibl.ACCTNO, ibl.AMOUNT, ibl.TRANTYPE, ibl.DATE_TIME, ibl.INOUT, ibl.SUCCESS, ibl.ENO, ibl.USERNO, ibl.CHEQUE, ibl.INCOME, ibl.COMMUCHARGE, ibl.REVERSAL, ibl.INCOMETYPE, ibl.RELATEDAC, ibl.RELATEDBRANCH, ibl.SOURCEBR, ibl.CURRENCY, br.BranchCode, br.BranchAlias, br.BranchDescription ) from TLMVIW00006 as ibl join ibl.FromBranchRelation as br where ibl.INCOME>0 and ibl.COMMUCHARGE>0 and ibl.REVERSAL = 0 and SubString(ltrim(ibl.TRANTYPE), 2, 1) = 'D' and ibl.TOBRANCH != :sourceBr and ibl.FROMBRANCH = :sourceBr and ibl.INCOMETYPE = 2 and ibl.SOURCEBR= :sourceBr and convert(char(10),ibl.DATE_TIME,111) between convert(char(10),:startDate,111) and convert(char(10),:endDate,111)

select new ibldto( ibl.FROMBRANCH, ibl.TOBRANCH, ibl.ACCTNO, ibl.AMOUNT, ibl.TRANTYPE, ibl.DATE_TIME, ibl.INOUT, ibl.SUCCESS, ibl.ENO, ibl.USERNO, ibl.CHEQUE, ibl.INCOME, ibl.COMMUCHARGE, ibl.REVERSAL, ibl.INCOMETYPE, ibl.RELATEDAC, ibl.RELATEDBRANCH, ibl.SOURCEBR, ibl.CURRENCY, br.BranchCode, br.BranchAlias, br.BranchDescription ) from TLMVIW00006 as ibl join ibl.ToBranchRelation as br where ibl.INCOME>0 and ibl.COMMUCHARGE>0 and ibl.REVERSAL = 0 and ibl.FROMBRANCH = :sourceBr and ibl.SOURCEBR= :sourceBr and convert(char(10),ibl.DATE_TIME,111) between convert(char(10),:startDate,111) and convert(char(10),:endDate,111)

select new ibldto( ibl.FROMBRANCH, ibl.TOBRANCH, ibl.ACCTNO, ibl.AMOUNT, ibl.TRANTYPE, ibl.DATE_TIME, ibl.INOUT, ibl.SUCCESS, ibl.ENO, ibl.USERNO, ibl.CHEQUE, ibl.INCOME, ibl.COMMUCHARGE, ibl.REVERSAL, ibl.INCOMETYPE, ibl.RELATEDAC, ibl.RELATEDBRANCH, ibl.SOURCEBR, ibl.CURRENCY, br.BranchCode, br.BranchAlias, br.BranchDescription ) from TLMVIW00006 as ibl join ibl.FromBranchRelation as br where ibl.SOURCEBR=:sourceBranch and ibl.FROMBRANCH = :branch and ibl.INOUT = 1 and ibl.AMOUNT>0 and ibl.TRANTYPE != 'ATL' and br.Active =1 and convert(char(10),ibl.DATE_TIME,111) between convert(char(10),:startDate,111) and convert(char(10),:endDate,111) order by ibl.ENO,ibl.ACCTNO,ibl.AMOUNT,SubString(ltrim(ibl.TRANTYPE), 2, 1) desc

select new ibldto( ibl.FROMBRANCH, ibl.TOBRANCH, ibl.ACCTNO, ibl.AMOUNT, ibl.TRANTYPE, ibl.DATE_TIME, ibl.INOUT, ibl.SUCCESS, ibl.ENO, ibl.USERNO, ibl.CHEQUE, ibl.INCOME, ibl.COMMUCHARGE, ibl.REVERSAL, ibl.INCOMETYPE, ibl.RELATEDAC, ibl.RELATEDBRANCH, ibl.SOURCEBR, ibl.CURRENCY, br.BranchCode, br.BranchAlias, br.BranchDescription ) from TLMVIW00006 as ibl join ibl.ToBranchRelation as br where ibl.TOBRANCH = :branch and ibl.SOURCEBR=:sourceBranch and ibl.INOUT = 0 and ibl.AMOUNT>0 and ibl.TRANTYPE != 'ATL' and ibl.REVERSAL = 0 and br.Active =1 and convert(char(10),ibl.DATE_TIME,111) between convert(char(10),:startDate,111) and convert(char(10),:endDate,111) order by ibl.ENO,ibl.ACCTNO,ibl.AMOUNT,SubString(ltrim(ibl.TRANTYPE), 2, 1) desc

select new ibldto( ibl.FROMBRANCH, ibl.TOBRANCH, ibl.ACCTNO, ibl.AMOUNT, ibl.TRANTYPE, ibl.DATE_TIME, ibl.INOUT, ibl.SUCCESS, ibl.ENO, ibl.USERNO, ibl.CHEQUE, ibl.INCOME, ibl.COMMUCHARGE, ibl.REVERSAL, ibl.INCOMETYPE, ibl.RELATEDAC, ibl.RELATEDBRANCH, ibl.SOURCEBR, ibl.CURRENCY, br.BranchCode, br.BranchAlias, br.BranchDescription ) from TLMVIW00006 as ibl join ibl.ToBranchRelation as br where ibl.TOBRANCH = :branch and ibl.SOURCEBR=:sourceBranch and ibl.INOUT = 0 and ibl.AMOUNT>0 and ibl.TRANTYPE != 'ATL' and ibl.TRANTYPE not like 'R%' and convert(char(10),ibl.DATE_TIME,111) between convert(char(10),:startDate,111) and convert(char(10),:endDate,111) order by ibl.ENO,ibl.ACCTNO,ibl.AMOUNT,SubString(ltrim(ibl.TRANTYPE), 2, 1) desc

select new ibldto( ibl.FROMBRANCH, ibl.TOBRANCH, ibl.ACCTNO, ibl.AMOUNT, ibl.TRANTYPE, ibl.DATE_TIME, ibl.INOUT, ibl.SUCCESS, ibl.ENO, ibl.USERNO, ibl.CHEQUE, ibl.INCOME, ibl.COMMUCHARGE, ibl.REVERSAL, ibl.INCOMETYPE, ibl.RELATEDAC, ibl.RELATEDBRANCH, ibl.SOURCEBR, ibl.CURRENCY ) from TLMVIW00006 as ibl where convert(char(10),ibl.DATE_TIME,111) between convert(char(10),:startDate,111) and convert(char(10),:endDate,111) and
ibl.FROMBRANCH=:branch and ibl.SOURCEBR=:sourceBranch and ibl.INOUT = 1 order by ibl.TOBRANCH asc,ibl.ACCTNO asc,ibl.ENO asc

select new ibldto( ibl.FROMBRANCH, ibl.TOBRANCH, ibl.ACCTNO, ibl.AMOUNT, ibl.TRANTYPE, ibl.DATE_TIME, ibl.INOUT, ibl.SUCCESS, ibl.ENO, ibl.USERNO, ibl.CHEQUE, ibl.INCOME, ibl.COMMUCHARGE, ibl.REVERSAL, ibl.INCOMETYPE, ibl.RELATEDAC, ibl.RELATEDBRANCH, ibl.SOURCEBR, ibl.CURRENCY ) from TLMVIW00006 as ibl where convert(char(10),ibl.DATE_TIME,111) between convert(char(10),:startDate,111) and convert(char(10),:endDate,111) and
ibl.TOBRANCH = :branch and ibl.SOURCEBR=:sourceBranch and ibl.INOUT = 0 order by ibl.TOBRANCH asc,ibl.ACCTNO asc,ibl.ENO asc

select new bankstatementdto (vw.DateTime,vw.AccountNo,vw.Cheque,vw.Description,vw.WithdrawAmount,vw.DepositAmount,vw.CreatedDate) from TLMVIW000A9 as vw where vw.WorkStation = :workstation and vw.AccountNo = :accountno and (Convert(char(10),vw.DateTime,111) between :startdate and :enddate)

select new bankstatementdto (vw.DateTime,vw.AccountNo,vw.Cheque,vw.Description,vw.WithdrawAmount,vw.DepositAmount,vw.CreatedDate) from TLMVIW000A9 as vw where vw.WorkStation = :workstation and vw.AccountNo = :accountno and (Convert(char(10),vw.DateTime,111) between :startdate and :enddate) and vw.OrgnEno = null

select new reportgeneratedto (vw.WithdrawAmount,vw.DepositAmount) from TLMVIW000A9 as vw where vw.WorkStation = :workstation and vw.AccountNo = :accountno and (Convert(char(10),vw.DateTime,111) between Convert(char(10),:firstdate,111) and Convert(char(10),:seconddate,111)) order by vw.DateTime,vw.ChkTime

select new reportgeneratedto (vw.DateTime,vw.AccountNo,vw.Cheque,vw.Description,vw.WithdrawAmount,vw.DepositAmount) from TLMVIW00A10 as vw where vw.WorkStation = :workstation and vw.AccountNo = :accountno and (Convert(char(10),vw.DateTime,111) between :startdate and :enddate)

select new reportgeneratedto (vw.WithdrawAmount,vw.DepositAmount) from TLMVIW00A10 as vw where vw.WorkStation = :workstation and vw.AccountNo = :accountno and (Convert(char(10),vw.DateTime,111) between Convert(char(10),:firstdate,111) and Convert(char(10),:seconddate,111)) order by vw.DateTime,vw.ChkTime
select new branchkeydto (vw.Code,vw.Value,vw.Start_Date,vw.Status) from TLMVIW00008 as vw
select max(vw.Start_Date) from TLMVIW00008 as vw where convert(char(10),vw.Start_Date,111) <= :datetime group by vw.Status
select new branchkeydto (vw.Id,vw.Code,vw.Value,vw.Start_Date,vw.Status, vw.Active) from TLMVIW00008 as vw where convert(char(10),vw.Start_Date,111) = :maxdate and vw.Active = true
select new baldto(vw.M1) from TLMVIW00009 as vw where vw.AccountNo = :accountno and vw.Budget = :budget
select new baldto(vw.M2,vw.M1) from TLMVIW00009 as vw where vw.AccountNo = :accountno and vw.Budget = :budget
select new baldto(vw.M3,vw.M2,vw.M1) from TLMVIW00009 as vw where vw.AccountNo = :accountno and vw.Budget = :budget
select new baldto(vw.M4,vw.M3,vw.M2,vw.M1) from TLMVIW00009 as vw where vw.AccountNo = :accountno and vw.Budget = :budget
select new baldto(vw.M5,vw.M4,vw.M3,vw.M2,vw.M1) from TLMVIW00009 as vw where vw.AccountNo = :accountno and vw.Budget = :budget
select new baldto(vw.M6,vw.M5,vw.M4,vw.M3,vw.M2,vw.M1) from TLMVIW00009 as vw where vw.AccountNo = :accountno and vw.Budget = :budget
select new baldto(vw.M7,vw.M6,vw.M5,vw.M4,vw.M3,vw.M2,vw.M1) from TLMVIW00009 as vw where vw.AccountNo = :accountno and vw.Budget = :budget
select new baldto(vw.M8,vw.M7,vw.M6,vw.M5,vw.M4,vw.M3,vw.M2,vw.M1) from TLMVIW00009 as vw where vw.AccountNo = :accountno and vw.Budget = :budget
select new baldto(vw.M9,vw.M8,vw.M7,vw.M6,vw.M5,vw.M4,vw.M3,vw.M2,vw.M1) from TLMVIW00009 as vw where vw.AccountNo = :accountno and vw.Budget = :budget
select new baldto(vw.M10,vw.M9,vw.M8,vw.M7,vw.M6,vw.M5,vw.M4,vw.M3,vw.M2,vw.M1) from TLMVIW00009 as vw where vw.AccountNo = :accountno and vw.Budget = :budget
select new baldto(vw.M11,vw.M10,vw.M9,vw.M8,vw.M7,vw.M6,vw.M5,vw.M4,vw.M3,vw.M2,vw.M1) from TLMVIW00009 as vw where vw.AccountNo = :accountno and vw.Budget = :budget
select new baldto(vw.M12,vw.M11,vw.M10,vw.M9,vw.M8,vw.M7,vw.M6,vw.M5,vw.M4,vw.M3,vw.M2,vw.M1) from TLMVIW00009 as vw where vw.AccountNo = :accountno and vw.Budget = :budget

select new reportgeneratedto (vw.Id, vw.ENO, vw.AccNo, vw.Desp, vw.Amount, vw.UserNo, vw.Date_Time, vw.Time, vw.AcSign, vw.SourceCur, vw.WorkStation, vw.SourceBr) from TLMVIW00021 as vw where vw.SourceBr=:sourceBr and vw.WorkStation=:workstation

select new reportgeneratedto (vw.Id, vw.ENO, vw.AccNo, vw.Desp, vw.Amount, vw.UserNo, vw.Date_Time, vw.Time, vw.AcSign, vw.SourceCur, vw.WorkStation, vw.SourceBr) from TLMVIW00021 as vw where vw.SourceBr=:sourceBr and vw.UserNo = :counterNo and vw.WorkStation=:workstation

select new reportgeneratedto (vw.Id, vw.ENO, vw.AccNo, vw.Desp, vw.Amount, vw.UserNo, vw.Date_Time, vw.Time, vw.AcSign, vw.SourceCur, vw.SourceBr) from TLMVIW00021 as vw where vw.SourceBr=:sourceBr and vw.AccNo = :accountNo and vw.WorkStation=:workstation

select new reportgeneratedto (vw.Id, vw.ENO, vw.AccNo, vw.Desp, vw.Amount, vw.UserNo, vw.Date_Time, vw.Time, vw.AcSign, vw.SourceCur, vw.WorkStation, vw.SourceBr) from TLMVIW00021 as vw where vw.SourceBr=:sourceBr and vw.WorkStation=:workstation and vw.AcSign like :acSign

select new reportgeneratedto (vw.Id, vw.ENO, vw.AccNo, vw.Desp, vw.Amount, vw.UserNo, vw.Date_Time, vw.Time, vw.AcSign, vw.SourceCur, vw.WorkStation, vw.SourceBr) from TLMVIW00021 as vw where vw.AcSign like :acSign and vw.SourceBr = :sourceBr and vw.WorkStation=:workstation

select new reportgeneratedto (vw.ENO,vw.AccNo,vw.Desp,vw.Amount,vw.UserNo,vw.Date_Time,vw.Time,vw.AcSign,vw.SourceCur,vw.WorkStation) from TLMVIW00024 as vw where convert(char(10),vw.Date_Time,111) between :startDate and :endDate and vw.SourceBr=:sourcebr and vw.WorkStation=:workstationId

select new reportgeneratedto (vw.ENO,vw.AccNo,vw.Desp,vw.Amount,vw.UserNo,vw.Date_Time,vw.Time,vw.AcSign,vw.SourceCur,vw.WorkStation) from TLMVIW00024 as vw where convert(char(10),vw.Date_Time,111) between :startDate and :endDate and vw.AcSign Like :acsign and vw.SourceBr=:sourcebr and vw.WorkStation=:workstation

select new reportgeneratedto (vw.ENO,vw.AccNo,vw.Desp,vw.Amount,vw.UserNo,vw.Date_Time,vw.Time,vw.AcSign,vw.SourceCur,vw.WorkStation) from TLMVIW00024 as vw where convert(char(10),vw.Date_Time,111) between :startDate and :endDate and vw.SourceBr=:sourcebr and vw.WorkStation=:workstationId and vw.UserNo=:userno

select new reportgeneratedto (vw.ENO,vw.AccNo,vw.Desp,vw.Amount,vw.UserNo,vw.Date_Time,vw.Time,vw.AcSign,vw.SourceCur,vw.WorkStation) from TLMVIW00024 as vw where convert(char(10),vw.Date_Time,111) between :startDate and :endDate and vw.AccNo=:accountno and vw.SourceBr=:sourcebr and vw.WorkStation=:workstation

select new reportgeneratedto ( vw.ACode, Sum(vw.HomeAmt), Sum(vw.HomeOAmt), vw.Status, vw.Narration, vw.WorkStation ) from TLMVIW00052 as vw where convert(char(10),vw.Date_Time,111)= :datetime and vw.sourcebr=:sourcebr and vw.WorkStation = :workstation group by vw.ACode,vw.Status,vw.Narration,vw.WorkStation order by vw.ACode

select new reportgeneratedto ( vw.ACode, Sum(vw.HomeAmt), Sum(vw.HomeOAmt), vw.Status, vw.Narration, vw.WorkStation ) from TLMVIW00052 as vw where convert(char(10),vw.SettlementDate,111)= :datetime and vw.sourcebr=:sourcebr and vw.WorkStation = :workstation group by vw.ACode,vw.Status,vw.Narration,vw.WorkStation order by vw.ACode

select new reportgeneratedto ( vw.ACode, Sum(vw.HomeAmt), Sum(vw.HomeOAmt), vw.Status, vw.Narration, vw.WorkStation ) from TLMVIW00052 as vw where convert(char(10),vw.Date_Time,111)= :datetime and vw.sourcebr=:sourcebr and vw.SourceCur=:currency and vw.WorkStation = :workstation group by vw.ACode,vw.Status,vw.Narration,vw.WorkStation order by vw.ACode

select new reportgeneratedto ( vw.ACode, Sum(vw.HomeAmt), Sum(vw.HomeOAmt), vw.Status, vw.Narration, vw.WorkStation ) from TLMVIW00052 as vw where convert(char(10),vw.SettlementDate,111)= :datetime and vw.sourcebr=:sourcebr and vw.SourceCur=:currency group by vw.ACode,vw.Status,vw.Narration,vw.WorkStation order by vw.ACode

select new daybookdto (vw.Debit_Cash,vw.Debit_Transfer,vw.Debit_Clearing,vw.Debit_Total,vw.Account_No,vw.Credit_Cash,vw.Credit_Clearing,vw.Credit_Transfer,vw.Credit_Total,vw.Date_Time,vw.Sort_Date_Time,vw.WorkStation,vw.Rate,vw.SettlementDate,vw.SourceCur,vw.SourceBr) from TLMVIW00A11 as vw where vw.WorkStation = :workStation and vw.SourceCur = :sourceCur and convert(char(10),vw.Date_Time,111) = convert(char(10),:requireDate,111) order by vw.Sort_Date_Time asc

select new daybookdto (vw.Debit_Cash,vw.Debit_Transfer,vw.Debit_Clearing,vw.Debit_Total,vw.Account_No,vw.Credit_Cash,vw.Credit_Clearing,vw.Credit_Transfer,vw.Credit_Total,vw.Date_Time,vw.Sort_Date_Time,vw.WorkStation,vw.Rate,vw.SettlementDate,vw.SourceCur,vw.SourceBr) from TLMVIW00A11 as vw where vw.WorkStation = :workStation and vw.SourceCur = :sourceCur and convert(char(10),vw.SettlementDate,111) = convert(char(10),:requireDate,111) order by vw.Sort_Date_Time asc

select new daybookdto (vw.Debit_Cash,vw.Debit_Transfer,vw.Debit_Clearing,vw.Debit_Total,vw.Account_No,vw.Credit_Cash,vw.Credit_Clearing,vw.Credit_Transfer,vw.Credit_Total,vw.Date_Time,vw.Sort_Date_Time,vw.WorkStation,vw.Rate,vw.SettlementDate,vw.SourceCur,vw.SourceBr) from TLMVIW00D17 as vw where vw.ACSign Like :acsign and vw.WorkStation = :workStation and vw.SourceCur = :sourceCur and convert(char(10),vw.Date_Time,111) = convert(char(10),:requireDate,111) order by vw.Sort_Date_Time asc

select new daybookdto (vw.Debit_Cash,vw.Debit_Transfer,vw.Debit_Clearing,vw.Debit_Total,vw.Account_No,vw.Credit_Cash,vw.Credit_Clearing,vw.Credit_Transfer,vw.Credit_Total,vw.Date_Time,vw.Sort_Date_Time,vw.WorkStation,vw.Rate,vw.SettlementDate,vw.SourceCur,vw.SourceBr) from TLMVIW00D17 as vw where vw.ACSign Like :acsign and vw.WorkStation = :workStation and vw.SourceCur = :sourceCur and convert(char(10),vw.Date_Time,111) = convert(char(10),:requireDate,111) order by vw.Account_No asc

select new daybookdto (vw.Debit_Cash,vw.Debit_Transfer,vw.Debit_Clearing,vw.Debit_Total,vw.Account_No,vw.Credit_Cash,vw.Credit_Clearing,vw.Credit_Transfer,vw.Credit_Total,vw.Date_Time,vw.Sort_Date_Time,vw.WorkStation,vw.Rate,vw.SettlementDate,vw.SourceCur,vw.SourceBr) from TLMVIW00D17 as vw where vw.ACSign Like :acsign and vw.WorkStation = :workStation and vw.SourceCur = :sourceCur and convert(char(10),vw.SettlementDate,111) = convert(char(10),:requireDate,111) order by vw.Sort_Date_Time asc

select new daybookdto (vw.Debit_Cash,vw.Debit_Transfer,vw.Debit_Clearing,vw.Debit_Total,vw.Account_No,vw.Credit_Cash,vw.Credit_Clearing,vw.Credit_Transfer,vw.Credit_Total,vw.Date_Time,vw.Sort_Date_Time,vw.WorkStation,vw.Rate,vw.SettlementDate,vw.SourceCur,vw.SourceBr) from TLMVIW00D17 as vw where vw.ACSign Like :acsign and vw.WorkStation = :workStation and vw.SourceCur = :sourceCur and convert(char(10),vw.SettlementDate,111) = convert(char(10),:requireDate,111) order by vw.Account_No asc

select new daybookdto (vw.Debit_Cash,vw.Debit_Transfer,vw.Debit_Clearing,vw.Debit_Total,vw.Account_No,vw.Credit_Cash,vw.Credit_Clearing,vw.Credit_Transfer,vw.Credit_Total,vw.Date_Time,vw.Sort_Date_Time,vw.WorkStation,vw.Rate,vw.SettlementDate,vw.SourceCur,vw.SourceBr) from TLMVIW00A12 as vw where vw.WorkStation = :workStation and vw.SourceCur = :sourceCur and convert(char(10),vw.Date_Time,111) = convert(char(10),:requireDate,111) order by vw.Sort_Date_Time asc

select new daybookdto (vw.Debit_Cash,vw.Debit_Transfer,vw.Debit_Clearing,vw.Debit_Total,vw.Account_No,vw.Credit_Cash,vw.Credit_Clearing,vw.Credit_Transfer,vw.Credit_Total,vw.Date_Time,vw.Sort_Date_Time,vw.WorkStation,vw.Rate,vw.SettlementDate,vw.SourceCur,vw.SourceBr) from TLMVIW00A13 as vw where vw.WorkStation = :workStation and vw.SourceCur = :sourceCur and convert(char(10),vw.Date_Time,111) = convert(char(10),:requireDate,111) order by vw.Account_No asc, vw.Sort_Date_Time asc

select new daybookdto (vw.Debit_Cash,vw.Debit_Transfer,vw.Debit_Clearing,vw.Debit_Total,vw.Account_No,vw.Credit_Cash,vw.Credit_Clearing,vw.Credit_Transfer,vw.Credit_Total,vw.Date_Time,vw.Sort_Date_Time,vw.WorkStation,vw.Rate,vw.SettlementDate,vw.SourceCur,vw.SourceBr) from TLMVIW00A13 as vw where vw.WorkStation = :workStation and vw.SourceCur = :sourceCur and convert(char(10),vw.Date_Time,111) = convert(char(10),:requireDate,111) order by vw.Account_No asc

select new rddto(vw.DrawingNo,vw.RegisterNo,vw.Br_Alias,vw.Type,vw.NRC,vw.Name,vw.ToName,vw.ToNRC,vw.TLxCharges,vw.Commission,vw.DBank,vw.ReceiptDate, vw.AccountNo,vw.Amount,vw.DateTime,vw.Currency,vw.SettlementDate,vw.OtherBank,vw.Bank_Alias,vw.IncomeType,vw.RDType) from TLMVIW00A16 as vw where Convert(char(10),vw.DateTime,111) between Convert(char(10),:startdate,111) and Convert(char(10),:enddate,111) and vw.SourceBr = :sourceBr order by vw.RegisterNo

select new rddto(vw.DrawingNo,vw.RegisterNo,vw.Br_Alias,vw.Type,vw.NRC,vw.Name,vw.ToName,vw.ToNRC,vw.TLxCharges,vw.Commission,vw.DBank,vw.ReceiptDate, vw.AccountNo,vw.Amount,vw.DateTime,vw.Currency,vw.SettlementDate,vw.OtherBank,vw.Bank_Alias,vw.RDType) from TLMVIW00A16 as vw where Convert(char(10),vw.SettlementDate,111) between Convert(char(10),:startdate,111) and Convert(char(10),:enddate,111) and vw.SourceBr = :sourceBr

select new TCMDTO00052 ( D.Cur, D.ReceiptCash, D.ReceiptCashVou, D.ReceiptTransfer, D.ReceiptTransferVou, D.ReceiptClearing, D.ReceiptClearingVou, D.PaymentCash, D.PaymentCashVou, D.PaymentTransfer, D.PaymentTransferVou, D.PaymentClearing, D.PaymentClearingVou, D.DrawingCash, D.DrawingCashVou, D.DrawingTransfer, D.DrawingTransferVou, D.EncashCash, D.EncashCashVou, D.EncashTransfer, D.EncashTransferVou, D.CashInHand, D.CashWithCBM, D.ACWithOthBank, D.CurOpened, D.CurClosed, D.CurTotal, D.CurOBal, D.CurDep, D.CurWith, D.SavOpened, D.SavClosed, D.SavTotal, D.SavOBal, D.SavDep, D.SavWith, D.CalOpened, D.CalClosed, D.CalTotal, D.CalOBal, D.CalDep, D.CalWith, D.FixOpened, D.FixClosed, D.FixTotal, D.FixOBal, D.FixDep, D.FixWith, D.Date_Time, D.D1_OTHERLOAN, D.D1_CNGLOAN, D.D1_OD, D.D1_STAFFLOAN, D.B_OTHERLOAN, D.B_CNGLOAN, D.B_OD, D.B_STAFFLOAN, D.R_0_OTHERLOAN, D.R_0_CNGLOAN, D.R_0_OD, D.R_0_STAFFLOAN, D.R_1_OTHERLOAN, D.R_1_CNGLOAN, D.R_1_OD, D.R_1_STAFFLOAN, D.R_2_OTHERLOAN, D.R_2_CNGLOAN, D.R_2_OD, D.R_2_STAFFLOAN, D.A1_OUTSTANDING, D.A2_CNGLOAN, D.A3_OD, D.A4_OUTSTANDING ) from TCMVIW00052 as D Where D.Cur=:Cur and Convert(Char(10),D.Date_Time,111) = Convert(Char(10),:datetime,111)
select new custIDByDateDTO(vw.Name,vw.NRC,vw.CustomerId) from MNMVIW00032 as vw where vw.AccountNo=:accountNo

select new LegalDto ( vw.AcctNo, vw.Lno, vw.AType, vw.LegalDate, vw.SAmt, legal.Bal, vw.LoansDesp, vw.IntRate, legal.OldInt, legal.OldExtra, legal.OldScharge, legal.Interest, legal.IntRate ) from LOMVIW00001 as vw, LOMORM00013 as legal where vw.AcctNo= :accountNo and legal.AcctNo = :accountNo and vw.Lno=legal.Lno and vw.LegalCase=true and legal.CloseDate = null and vw.SourceBr= :sourceBr and legal.SourceBr= :sourceBr and legal.Active=true

select new reportgeneratedto ( vw.AcctNo, vw.Amount, vw.DATE_TIME ) from LOMVIW00002 as vw where vw.AcctNo= :accountNo and vw.SourceBranch= :sourceBr and Convert(Char(10),vw.DATE_TIME,111) between Convert(Char(10),:startDate,111) and Convert(Char(10),:endDate,111) Order By Date_time

select new rddto(vw.ReceiptDate,vw.DrawingNo,vw.RegisterNo,vw.Br_Alias,vw.Commision,vw.Amount,vw.DBank,vw.Total,vw.TLxCharges,vw.DateTime,vw.Currency,vw.SettlementDate,vw.OtherBank, vw.Budget) from MNMVIW00083 as vw where vw.SourceBr = :sourceBr and DATEPART(yyyy, vw.ReceiptDate)=:year and DATEPART(MM, vw.ReceiptDate)=:month and vw.Budget=:budget

select new rddto(vw.ReceiptDate,vw.DrawingNo,vw.RegisterNo,vw.Br_Alias,vw.Commision,vw.Amount,vw.DBank,vw.Total,vw.TLxCharges,vw.DateTime,vw.Currency,vw.SettlementDate,vw.OtherBank, vw.Budget) from MNMVIW00083 as vw where vw.SourceBr = :sourceBr and DATEPART(yyyy, vw.SettlementDate)=:year and DATEPART(MM, vw.SettlementDate)=:month and vw.Budget=:budget

select new redto(vw.IssueDate,vw.EncashNo,vw.Br_Alias,vw.RegisterNo,vw.Amount,vw.EBank,vw.DateTime,vw.Currency,vw.SettlementDate,vw.OtherBank, vw.Budget) from MNMVIW00084 as vw where vw.SourceBr = :sourceBr and DATEPART(yyyy, vw.IssueDate)=:year and DATEPART(MM, vw.IssueDate)=:month and vw.Budget=:budget

select new redto(vw.IssueDate,vw.EncashNo,vw.Br_Alias,vw.RegisterNo,vw.Amount,vw.EBank,vw.DateTime,vw.Currency,vw.SettlementDate,vw.OtherBank, vw.Budget) from MNMVIW00084 as vw where vw.SourceBr = :sourceBr and DATEPART(yyyy, vw.SettlementDate)=:year and DATEPART(MM, vw.SettlementDate)=:month and vw.Budget=:budget
select new vintratedto(vw.CODE,vw.DURATION,vw.DESP,vw.RATE,vw.DATE_TIME,vw.USERNO,vw.STATUS) from SAMVIW00001 as vw where vw.STATUS = :status order by vw.CODE
select new vintratedto(vw.CODE,vw.DURATION,vw.DESP,vw.RATE,vw.DATE_TIME,vw.USERNO,vw.STATUS) from SAMVIW00001 as vw where vw.CODE != ''
select new vintratedto(vw.CODE,vw.DURATION,vw.DESP,vw.RATE,vw.DATE_TIME,vw.USERNO,vw.STATUS) from SAMVIW00001 as vw where vw.CODE = :rate
select new savingaccruedDTO ( vw.AccountNo, vw.CloseDate, vw.CurrencyCode, vw.Amount, vw.ACNAME ) from MNMVIW00071 as vw where vw.Amount > 0 and vw.CloseDate = null and vw.Active=true

select new savingaccruedDTO ( vw.AcctNo, vw.Type, vw.Date_Time, vw.Cur, vw.Amount, vw.ACNAME ) from MNMVIW00072 as vw where convert(char(10),vw.Date_Time,111) between convert(char(10),:startDate,111) and convert(char(10),:endDate,111)

select new savingaccruedDTO ( vw.AcctNo, vw.Type, vw.Date_Time, vw.Cur, vw.Amount, vw.ACNAME ) from MNMVIW00072 as vw where convert(char(10),vw.Date_Time,111) between convert(char(10),:startDate,111) and convert(char(10),:endDate,111) and vw.Type='C'

select new savingaccruedDTO ( vw.AcctNo, vw.Type, vw.Date_Time, vw.Cur, vw.Amount, vw.ACNAME ) from MNMVIW00072 as vw where convert(char(10),vw.Date_Time,111) between convert(char(10),:startDate,111) and convert(char(10),:endDate,111) and vw.Type='T'

select new fixinwithdto ( vw.AccountNo, vw.Amount, vw.Date_Time, vw.CreditAccountNo, vw.SourceBranchCode, vw.Currency, vw.SettlementDate ) from MNMVIW00085 as vw where convert(char(10),vw.Date_Time,111) between convert(char(10),:startDate,111) and convert(char(10),:endDate,111) and vw.SourceBranchCode=:sourceBr

select new fixinwithdto ( vw.AccountNo, vw.Amount, vw.Date_Time, vw.CreditAccountNo, vw.SourceBranchCode, vw.Currency, vw.SettlementDate ) from MNMVIW00085 as vw where convert(char(10),vw.SettlementDate,111) between convert(char(10),:startDate,111) and convert(char(10),:endDate,111) and vw.SourceBranchCode=:sourceBr
